hero.title: Mouj Muscat Car Rentals
hero.slogan: Discover the Freedom of the Open Road

fleet.title: Variety Of Vehicles
fleet.subtitle: Your adventure begins with Mouj Muscat Car Rentals. Explore Oman with confidence, knowing you have a reliable partner by your side. Start your journey today by browsing our fleet and securing your reservation online.
fleet.heroText: Impressive fleet of vehicles designed to cater to every type of traveler and adventure enthusiast. Whether you're embarking on a solo expedition, a family vacation, or a business trip, our diverse selection ensures you'll find the ideal companion for the road ahead.
fleet.browseSubtitle: Explore our fleet in detail, view vehicle specifications, and choose the perfect ride for your upcoming journey.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChoose.subtitle: Here we take pride in offering a range of services designed to make your journey as seamless and enjoyable as possible. Whether you're a local exploring your own city or a tourist ready to discover the beauty of Oman, our services are tailored to meet your unique travel needs.
whyChoose.pricingDesc: No hidden fees, no surprises. Our pricing is straightforward and competitive and what you see is what you pay.
whyChoose.excellenceDesc: Our dedicated team is here to assist you every step of the way, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable rental experience.
whyChoose.flexibleDesc: Whether you need a vehicle for a day, a week, or longer, we offer flexible rental options to suit your plans.
whyChoose.bookingDesc: Convenience at your fingertips. Easily reserve your vehicle online, and we'll have it ready for you when you arrive.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Your Journey, Our Priority
mission.text: At Mouj Muscat, our mission is simple: to enhance your travel experience by providing reliable, high-quality vehicles and exceptional customer service. We understand that each journey is unique, and we are dedicated to tailoring our services to meet your individual needs and preferences.

stats.description: Established with a passion for exploration and a commitment to exceptional service, our car rental company is more than just a provider of vehicles, we're your gateway to unforgettable experiences in Oman.

cities.title: Two Cities, Countless Possibilities
cities.subtitle: Explore the beauty of Muscat or experience the lush landscapes of Salalah. Our strategically located branches make it easy for you to start your journey wherever you are. Enjoy the freedom to travel on your terms, discovering hidden gems and iconic landmarks at your own pace.
cities.muscatAddress: Behind Bawshar Municipality, Next to Cytidines Hotel, Al Gubra South, Muscat, Sultanate of Oman
cities.salalahAddress: 23rd July Street. Al zahir Medical complex Building, Salalah, Sultanate of Oman

discovery.title: Discovery Oman
discovery.text: Embark on a transformative journey with our specialized services, guiding you to discover the rich tapestry of Oman. Our curated experiences seamlessly blend comfort and exploration, offering you a unique opportunity to delve into the captivating beauty of this Arabian gem. From the ancient traditions and cultural marvels to the breathtaking landscapes and hidden treasures, we invite you to uncover Oman's secrets with us.

about.heroText: Discover Oman effortlessly: Transparent rates, top-notch vehicles, and 24/7 roadside assistance for a seamless travel experience.
about.welcomeText1: Established with a passion for exploration and a commitment to exceptional service, Mouj Muscat Car Rentals is more than just a car rental company – we are your gateway to unforgettable experiences in the Sultanate of Oman.
about.welcomeText2: Our journey began with a simple vision: to provide travelers with the means to explore the diverse landscapes, rich history, and vibrant culture of Oman at their own pace.
about.storySubtitle: A Legacy of Excellence in Oman
about.storyText: What sets us apart is our deep-rooted connection to the Omani landscape. We understand that every journey is unique, and we take pride in offering a diverse fleet of vehicles, from rugged 4x4s designed to conquer the desert terrain, to sleek sedans perfect for navigating the city streets.
about.value1Text: Our competitive pricing structure ensures that you get the best value for your money, with no hidden fees or surprises.
about.value2Text: Your satisfaction is our top priority. Our friendly team is dedicated to making your rental experience seamless and enjoyable.
about.value3Text: Benefit from our in-depth knowledge of Oman. We provide insights and recommendations to enhance your travel experience.
about.qualityText: Our vehicles undergo rigorous maintenance and inspection protocols, ensuring they are in top-notch condition for your journey.

services.heroText: We offer a comprehensive range of services designed to meet the diverse needs of our clients. Whether you need a vehicle for business or leisure, short-term or long-term rental, we have the perfect solution for you.
services.title: Our Key Services
services.subtitle: We've tailored our services to ensure every aspect of your journey is covered, from the moment you book to the drive back home.
services.service1Desc: Choose from our wide range of meticulously maintained vehicles, including sedans, SUVs, and 4x4s.
services.service2Desc: Enjoy transparent pricing without hidden fees. Our rates are competitive, ensuring you get the best value.
services.service3Desc: Whether for a day, a week, or longer, our flexible rental options allow you to plan according to your schedule.
services.service4Desc: Reserve your vehicle easily through our online platform. Your chosen vehicle will be ready when you are.
services.service5Desc: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist you with any queries or concerns.
services.service6Desc: Enjoy hassle-free airport transfers with timely pick-up and drop-off services at Muscat and Salalah airports.
services.service7Desc: Drive with peace of mind. Our vehicles come with comprehensive insurance coverage for a worry-free journey.
services.service8Desc: In the rare event of a breakdown, our 24/7 roadside assistance ensures you're never stranded.

contact.heroText: We value your inquiries, feedback, and the opportunity to assist you with your car rental needs.
contact.supportText: Our dedicated customer support team is available 24/7 to address your queries and provide assistance.
contact.channelsTitle: Contact Mouj Muscat Car Rentals through the following channels
contact.reach5: Any other assistance you may need
contact.branchesSubtitle: If you prefer face-to-face interaction, you can visit our branches in Muscat and Salalah.

footer.getInTouchText: Use our contact form for all information requests or contact us directly using the contact information below. Feel free to get in touch with us via email or phone
footer.formTitle: Get started with a free Booking
footer.name: Your Name
footer.subject: Subject
footer.socialText: Stay updated on our latest offerings, promotions, and travel tips by connecting with us on social media.
footer.copyright: Copyright © 2026 All Rights Reserved Mouj Muscat.

insured.title: Fully Insured Fleet
insured.text: Every vehicle in our fleet comes with comprehensive insurance coverage, providing you with peace of mind during your travels. Our insurance packages are designed to cover a range of situations, ensuring you can focus on enjoying the journey without unnecessary worry.

documents.title: Documents Required for Car Rental
documents.depositNote: Note: A refundable security deposit of OMR 50 is required for all foreign nationals at the time of rental.
